title: Yufeng

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At night, you may choose to visit another player. If anyone tries to attack them, transfur them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your visit is astral unless your target's attacked.
- If there's an attacker, everyone visiting, as well as your target, will be notified that something swooped by outside, and everyone who visits your target will have their ability fail unless they are another latex, and your target will be roleblocked unless they are another latex.
- You can only transfur one attacker at a time.

desc:
Post 2895
*"A variation of their wingless cousins. While some have reported to have flight, They often don't fly." -Dr.██████, MIT.*
